data.title: Bernau (b Berlin) → Strausberg by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Bernau (b Berlin) to Strausberg in 1h 1m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Bernau (b Berlin) to Strausberg today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Bernau (b Berlin) to Strausberg by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 1 hour 16 minutes to travel from Bernau (b Berlin) to Strausberg by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 1 hour 1 minute though. You'll usually find 23 trains per day running along the 14 miles (23 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 1 change during the journey to Strausberg, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route.

Plan your trip ahead and book your train tickets in advance if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Just start a search in our Journey Planner to view the latest prices for trains from Bernau (b Berlin) to Strausberg.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Strausberg by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
